alert.note: Alert for Green; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:46AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette and Green Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 445 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms across Lafayette and Green counties. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Brodhead, Darlington, New Glarus, Shullsburg, Monticello, Albany, Belmont, Benton, Argyle, Blanchardville, Apple River, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Elk Grove, Fayette, Lamont, Browntown, and Gratiot. This includes U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 23 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
